name: Retargeting Pixel
headline: Integration with the Retargeting marketing platform
overview: Retargeting (Retargeting.biz) is an ecommerce-oriented marketing platform active in several Central and Eastern European countries. The platform allows users to automate their ad spend on Google, Facebook, Youtube, and Instagram, but also create automated email and SMS campaigns for their online stores. This app allows the placement of the Retargeting pixel on a VTEX store.
features: Allows the placement of the Retargeting pixel on your store
Makes the store visible in the Retargeting platform
Empowers store owners to use Retargeting's wide range of marketing services, including paid ads, SMS, and email campaigns.
additionalInformation: This application requires a paid Retargeting.biz account.
